message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know is worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm confident you'll find it incredibly valuable.  While I can't disclose details until you accept the offer, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000. This is a price that gives you significant value, while also ensuring I get a fair return. Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss further.
